{% load sekizai_tags cms_tags %}{% if request.toolbar.edit_mode %} {# Code is only rendered in edit mode #} {% comment %} CMS needs render_plugin to be called, but the plugins should not be anywhere in the page. So we use a sekizai block which is never rendered {% endcomment %} {% addtoblock "null" %}
{% for plugin in instance.child_plugin_instances %} {% render_plugin plugin %} {% endfor %}
